alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns County through 630 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picolata, or 9 miles southeast of Green Cove Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, World Golf Village, Picolata, Saint Augustine South and Bakersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
